DOC.brief_summary: In study compare two treatment major depression - fluoxetine brief psychodynamic psychotherapy . In addition traditional outcome measure , also measure densities 5HT-1A D-2 receptor treatment . The main hypothesis brief psychotherapy effective fluoxetine .
DOC.brief_title: Fluoxetine vs. Brief Psychotherapy Major Depression
DOC.detailed_description: This study randomize comparison two treatment major depression - fluoxetine brief psychodynamic psychotherapy . The patient recruit occupational health service suffer mild moderate major depressive disorder . The treatment last 16 week . The main outcome measure include HAM-D , BDI , SOFAS , Rand-36 . In addition traditional outcome measure , also measure densities 5HT-1A D-2 receptor treatment use Positron Emission Tomography ( PET ) . The main hypothesis brief psychotherapy effective fluoxetine , differences treatment see PET scan .
DOC.criteria: MDD ( mild moderate ) HDRS 15 , age 2060 year No treatment precede 4 month No DSMIV axis I II comorbidity No severe somatic illness No contraindication fluoxetine treatment
